## Web3sdksNftMedia variable

This component can be used to render NFTs from the web3sdks SDK. Props: [Web3sdksNftMediaProps](./react.web3sdksnftmediaprops.md)

## Example

```jsx
import { Web3sdksNftMedia, useContract, useNFT } from "@web3sdks/react";
export default function NFTCollectionRender() {
  const { contract } = useContract(<your-contract-address>);
  const { data: nft, isLoading } = useNFT(contract, 0);

  return (
    <div>
      {!isLoading && nft ? (
        <Web3sdksNftMedia metadata={nft.metadata} />
      ) : (
        <p>Loading...</p>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
Web3sdksNftMedia: React.ForwardRefExoticComponent<
  Web3sdksNftMediaProps & React.RefAttributes<HTMLMediaElement>
>;
```
